nodes.text: Mot Draken was a male Bith who was on Tansarii Point Station.

Around 1 ABY, he was down on his luck and getting drunk at the bar on Tansarii Point Station. He had had a crush on O'choa Detera ever since he got on the station two years prior. His last baffling attempt at impressing was stuffing his mouth with Flurr-Cle onions.

Mot Draken appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. He was based on a former Galaxies tester, the late Tom Drake.[source?]
